content.rendered:
Noida Expressway (Godrej Tropical Isle) has caught the eyes of domestic as well as foreign investors in recent times. Well connected world class infrastructure with the facilities like world class International schools, Top Hospitals, Shopping Malls, Business Arcades, IT/ITES Park/SEZs , lush green landscaping and the close proximity of upcoming Jewar International Airport attracted the luxury home buyers to Noida Express way.
Here are some recent developments on the Noida E-way,
☑Max has recently launched “Max Estate 128” at 18000/sqft (now trading at 20k) which is fully sold out in 10 days
☑Ace -153 a commercial project- Sold out in 4 hours time( Launched on 23/07/2023)
☑Gulshan Dynasty is trading at Rs 17000/sqft
☑ Godrej Palm Retreat is trading at Rs 12000/sqft
☑Mahagun Manorialle is at 16000/Sqft
☑Kalpataru Vista is trading at Rs 15000/sqft
☑ County 107 is trading at Rs 16000/sqft

Exciting Launch Price : Godrej Tropical Isle
Now the wait is over, the alluring unique tropical theme (First of its kind in India, that comprises the Tropical Island concept,Sabanas,Lagoon,Tropical Cloud Forest , Floating Restaurant and lots more)
makes it an outstanding place to own a home and to surprise the market, the launch
Price, @11.83K PSF makes it more of an astronomical investment opportunity.
For Instance,
Surroundings prevailing rates (Nearest project Gulshan Dynasty @17K PSF)
Godrej Tropical Isle would be trading at min 17K PSF in year’s time)
Expected appreciation of 5000 PSF approx.
If invested in 3 BHK (1800 sqfit)
The total gain would be: 1800*5000=90 Lakh
Please call for more details,

Best Regards
Ram Kumar Gupta
Dr Realty
